snippet: Friends and family shared memories and impassioned defenses of Miriam Carey, the woman shot and killed in a car chase in Washington, at her wake on Monday.
abstract: Friends and family of Miriam Carey share memories of her that starkly conflict with the erratic, mentally ill woman seen on television screens and newspaper reports across the country; Carey was shot and killed when she led police on a car chase in Washington, DC, after attempting to ram her vehicle into a barricade at the White House.
lead_paragraph: Friends and family shared memories and impassioned defenses of Miriam Carey, the woman shot and killed in a car chase in Washington, at her wake on Monday.

headline.main: In Brooklyn, Questioning Violent Death Near Capitol
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, Questioning Violent Death Near Capitol
